title: What version of doom bots of doom unlocks the teemo doom icon?
body:
I've beaten the previous doom bots of doom which was last week 28th 29th of Noctober lulz.

It was the original version of Doom Bots of Doom which had no difficulty selection, it didn't say "The Teemoing" or "The Gauntlet".

But I have beaten it a few times and wondering if there is a specific version of that mode im supposed to play it on?

This is too confusing because I don't know if im valid to get the icon or not since there are multiple queues of Doom bots of Doom.

It would've been better if Riot stuck to just one queue where we can choose difficulty rather than just use the default version.

For future event rewards can you please add the achievement details for these rewards into the client rather than just browsing the internet or checking progress on websites like with ascension rewards back in 2014 (got them all btw) it will speed up checking the details we need to know just incase we forget.

replies.body: The type doesn't matter, so any mod will be fine!  Keep in mind that icons are aimed to distribute by the 17th, so it'll be a bit of time before you might see it unlocked.  Hang tight until then!

Oh so my recent win on 100 difficulty wasn't needed when i went mid {{champion:40}}.

Thanks for clearing this up for me but I had to be safe than sorry by just beating it again.

!!Riot senpai notice me!!

Thanks for clearing this up.

But for real the variations of doom bots made me a bit worried i might waste my time on one version that wont get me the reward.
It certainly sounds like you were triumphant against all odds.  You made a good job!
